### Usage

```
ocm cache describe [<options>]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for describe
```

### Description


Show details about the OCI blob cache (if given).
	

### Examples

```

$ ocm cache info

```

### See Also

* [ocm cache](/docs/cli/cache)	 &mdash; Cache related commands
